name: py-sanic

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Sanic is a Flask-like Python 3.5+ web server that is written to go fast.
It is based on the work done by the amazing folks at magicstack

dependencies.name: py-aiofiles
dependencies.description:
aiofiles is an Apache2 licensed library, written in Python, for handling
local disk files in asyncio applications.

dependencies.name: py-brotlipy
dependencies.description: Python binding to the Brotli library.

dependencies.name: py-hstspreload
dependencies.description: Chromium HSTS Preload list as a Python package and updated daily

dependencies.name: py-httptools
dependencies.description: httptools is a Python binding for the nodejs HTTP parser.

dependencies.name: py-httpx
dependencies.description:
HTTPX is a fully featured HTTP client for Python 3, which provides sync
and async APIs, and support for both HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2.

dependencies.name: py-multidict
dependencies.description:
Multidict is dict-like collection of key-value pairs where key might be
occurred more than once in the container.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ujson
dependencies.description: Ultra fast JSON decoder and encoder written in C with Python bindings.

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: py-uvloop
dependencies.description: uvloop is a fast, drop-in replacement of the built-in asyncio event

dependencies.name: py-websockets
dependencies.description:
websockets is a library for building WebSocket servers and clients in
Python with a focus on correctness and simplicity.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk
dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io
